item.title: It’s slightly drier for a few days before wetter pattern by Sunday
Biloxi Fire Museum to celebrate 25 years with ribbon cutting event
item.description: Hugh Keaton takes us to the Biloxi Fire Museum, which is celebrating 25 years with a special ribbon-cutting event.

item.title: Rotary Club of Sarasota donates $90,000 Outdoor Patio to Booker Middle School
item.description: Rotary Club of Sarasota donates $90,000 Outdoor Patio to Booker Middle School

item.title: A Lutz man has been arrested for allegedly threatening to kill students in Oregon
item.description: A Lutz man has been arrested for allegedly threatening to kill students in Oregon

item.title: Resolution honoring Charlie Kirk rejected after condemnation from NAACP branch
item.description: A resolution made by a city council in Missouri to honor Charlie Kirk was rejected Tuesday after the proposal was condemned by the local NAACP branch.

item.title: Many Americans plan to change jobs in the next year, survey finds
item.description: Millions of workers are rethinking their careers and paychecks, according to a new study. Consumer Investigator Rachel DePompa talks with Bankrate about the job market and what people looking for work can expect.

item.title: Rotary Club of Sarasota donates $90,000 Outdoor Patio to Booker Middle School
item.description: These additions make a positive impact on faculty, students, and their families.

item.title: Friends & loved ones reflect on the life and legacy of iconic Booker High School coach Fred Gilmore
item.description: The 1983 Booker High School graduate later came back and coached at his Alma mater for more than 30 years.

item.title: A-List Talks: Meet Susan Szantosi, Sarasota’s Creative Collaborator!
How to contact ABC over Jimmy Kimmel Live cancellation
item.description: Comments can be directed to ABC’s corporate website.

item.title: ‘I’m guilty.’ Lutz man charged with making threats to kill teacher, students in Oregon
item.description: He was charged with written or electronic threat to conduct a mass shooting or act of terrorism.

item.title: Sarasota County approves $9.4M Manasota Beach Road bridge improvement project
item.description: Sarasota County officials say construction is expected to be complete by the end of 2028.

item.title: Locals concerned as 1.7 million gallons of wastewater bypassed into Manatee River
item.description: The bypass happened on September 8th and has been causing concern within the community.

item.title: Dry air shutting down the rain
item.description: Tropical moisture has moved out and will stay away for the next few days.
